title: FantaMorph Deluxe v4.1 Multilingual
description:
FantaMorph Deluxe v4.1 Multilingual | 6.19 MB

FantaMorph - easy to use program to create animated images to the effect of morphing imagery and various deformities. With this program you can create amazing animated images with smooth transition from one picture to another by applying different effects and deformations. The program has a large number of preset effects, supports the import of video, and also has ample opportunities for setting up and improving the quality of images. You can crop, rotate, adjust color, add different markings and stunning effects using the built-in tools for editing without the need to resort to a third-party applications. The program supports a large number of graphic formats, including BMP, JPEG, TIFF, PNG, GIF, TGA, PCX and others. The result you will be able to export to AVI format, Animated GIF, Flash, Screen saver, autonomous EXE file and other formats.
